scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint, kneels in a verdant landscape with rolling hills and a body of water in the background. The figure wears a blue tunic and a rose-colored mantle, holding a book in their left arm and a stalk of wheat in their right hand. To the left, a grey tower with a blue conical roof stands prominently. The scene is illuminated with a golden halo around the figure's head and a starry sky above.
